title: How to Crush Peanuts
steps: Fill a small plastic bag with 1 cup (.2 liters) of unshelled peanuts.
Place the bag on a cutting board and gently beat it with a rolling pin.
Use both hands to roll the rolling pin over the bag of peanuts.
Dump the peanuts out of the bag and onto the cutting board.
Use the rolling pin to press down on the peanuts and crush them.

title: How to Grate Nutmeg
steps: Purchase a nut mill, spice grinder or nutmeg grinder from a kitchen retailer.
Buy fresh whole nutmeg.
Crack the nutmeg shell off by pressing a plate or knife turned sideways on the nut while it is on the cutting board.
Open the nut mill.
Pick up the mill and place it on the surface where you want your grated nutmeg to fall.
Turn the crank until you have enough nutmeg to use in your recipe.
Keep the nutmeg inside the mill.

title: How to Roast Nuts
steps: Toss the nuts in a little oil.
Spread out the nuts on a microwave-safe plate.
Cook in one-minute intervals.

title: How to Roast Walnuts
steps: Preheat the oven.
Beat one egg white.
Choose spices.
Toss the walnuts in the egg white mixture.
Spread the nuts on a baking pan.
Roast the nuts.
Remove the walnuts.
Reduce the heat.
Return the walnuts to the oven.
Remove the walnuts.

title: How to Toast Walnuts
steps: Allow the nuts to cool slightly.
Peel back the corners of the "x.".
Use a nutcracker only if necessary.
Rub the walnuts with a towel.
Serve warm.

title: How to Make a Mixed Nut Roast
steps: Spray a loaf pan with nonstick cooking spray and set it aside.
Fill a bowl with ice water and set it on your countertop.
Boil the 3 cabbage leaves in boiling water until they are crisp tender.
Heat the olive oil in a nonstick skillet.
Add the garlic cloves and sauté for about 30 seconds or until they are fragrant.
Pour in the diced tomatoes.
Combine the water and Marmite or Vegemite in a small bowl.
Grind the toasted nuts in a food processor.
Combine the nuts, vegetable mixture, cooked grains, parsley, thyme, cheese and eggs in a large bowl.
Lay the reserved cabbage leaves over the bottom of the loaf tin.
Bake the nut roast for 45 minutes.
Remove the nut roast from the oven and allow it to cool.
Cut the nut roast into slices with a serrated knife.

title: How to Roast a Pig
steps: Dig your pit.
Build a fire inside the rock pit.
Wait for the fire to burn down.
Place the stones in the pig when they are hot.
Cover the coals and rocks in the hole with banana leaves.
Lower the pig down into the hole.
Let the pig steam.
Uncover the pig.

title: How to Salt Peanuts
steps: Rinse the peanuts.
Place the peanuts, water, and salt in a stock pot.
Simmer the peanuts for several hours.
Test the peanuts and cook longer if necessary.
Drain the peanuts and allow them to cool.

title: How to Salt Nuts
steps: Rinse raw peanuts in fresh water.
Bring the water, salt, and peanuts to a boil.
Take the stockpot off the heat.

title: How to Roast Pine Nuts
steps: Rinse the unshelled pine nuts and put them in a microwave safe bowl.
Microwave the pine nuts for 6 minutes.
Heat the pine nuts in 1-minute intervals.
Remove the pine nuts and cool them on a plate or sheet.
Crack the shells with a rolling pin.

title: How to Roast Peanuts
steps: Try skinning shelled peanuts.
Use creative seasonings.
Make glazed peanuts.
Grind your roasted peanuts to make peanut butter.

title: How to Make Kheer
steps: Learn about vermicelli kheer.
Gather supplies.
Roast the dried fruits and nuts and vermicelli.
Cook your vermicelli kheer.
Add the condensed milk, cardamom and saffron and cook longer.
Garnish with the remaining dried fruits and nuts.
Serve and enjoy!.

title: How to Dry Peanuts
steps: Roast peanuts in the shell.
Roast peanuts out of the shell.
Roast in light oil.

title: How to Roast Turnips
steps: Select the turnips.
Make crisp roasted turnips.
Make soft roasted turnips.

title: How to Roast Pistachios
steps: Prepare sweet and smoky roasted pistachios.
Make curry flavored roasted pistachios.
Make spicy roasted pistachios.
